page.title: 17School Sports in Congleton
page.content: Precis of letter to {Congleton {Chronicle }14 June 1985. ' Even Headmasters make mistakes!' The issue in question was the winning team in the{Congleton Primary Schools {Sports Association}football league competition.The season closed with Daven school and Quinta school sharing the leadership.A mistake in the calculation of goal difference lead to the premature presentation of the trophy and winning medals to the Daven team.A further investigation categorically proved that the Quinta were outright winners but to minimise disappointment to the Daven team they were permitted to keep their medals and a duplicate set of medals was presented to the Quinta team.The schools decided to share the trophy for display purposes.
